```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(googlesheets4)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
my_cold_call <- function() {
  sheets_deauth()
  x <- read_sheet("1LtupNx8yBeJzK6UyGkZ5u-aUAPzU90K9C4r2RTJwWqg") %>% 
    select(Student) %>% 
    sample_n(1) %>% 
    pull(Student)
    return(x)
}

print(my_cold_call())
```
